tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Farming_Equipment (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  equipment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  gps_latitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
  gps_longitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
  last_known_location VARCHAR(100),
  last_update_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE equipment_location (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    location_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_movement (
    movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    movement_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    direction VARCHAR(50),
    speed FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment_location(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
    equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
    location_latitude DECIMAL(10,8),
    location_longitude DECIMAL(11,8)
);

CREATE TABLE GPS_data (
    gps_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    latitude DECIMAL(10,8),
    longitude DECIMAL(11,8),
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE movement_history (
    movement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    speed DECIMAL(5,2),
    direction VARCHAR(10),
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
    equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
    equipment_location_lat DECIMAL(9,6),
    equipment_location_long DECIMAL(9,6)
);

CREATE TABLE GPSData (
    gps_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    gps_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    gps_lat DECIMAL(9,6),
    gps_long DECIMAL(9,6),
    gps_speed DECIMAL(5,2)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
    equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
    gps_latitude DECIMAL,
    gps_longitude DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_history (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_time TIMESTAMP,
    event_location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_maintenance (
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_location (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    location_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location_latitude DECIMAL,
    location_longitude DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE equipment_alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_time TIMESTAMP,
    alert_details TEXT
);
